name.baseName: cement production;cement, ordinary portland cement;new dry process, <2000 t/d
水泥生产;水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥;新型干法, <2000 t/d

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The impact of a typical process of small-scale(<2000t/d or less) on the resource consumption, energy consumption and environmental emissions involved in the cement production life cycle was quantified using 1t of ordinary silicate cement as a functional unit.
以1t普通硅酸盐水泥为功能单位，对小型（<2000t/d以下）新型干法典型工艺对水泥生产生命周期中所涉及的资源消耗、能源消耗及环境排放的影响进行量化。

technology.technologicalApplicability: Technical Usage of Ordinary Portland Cement: This cement is used for construction applications, including residential, commercial, industrial, and infrastructure projects. It serves as a fundamental component for creating concrete, mortar, and stucco, and is suitable for general use where high early strength is not a critical requirement.
普通硅酸盐水泥的技术用途：该水泥用于建筑应用，包括住宅、商业、工业和基础设施项目。它是制造混凝土、砂浆和灰泥的基本组成部分，适用于不要求高早期强度的一般用途。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Taking 1 ton of ordinary Portland cement as the functional unit. The scope of the study is defined as the first and second stages of cement production, that is, the direct environmental impact of the four processes of raw meal preparation, clinker burning, cement grinding, packaging and delivery, as well as the upstream limestone mining and coal production processes. Indirect environmental impacts arising from production and electricity production processes and raw material transportation.
以 1 t 普通硅酸盐水泥为功能单位。将研究范围界定为水泥生产的第一阶段和第二阶段，即生料制备、熟料烧成、水泥粉磨、包装出厂四个工艺过程的直接环境影响以及与水泥生产上游的石灰石开采、煤炭生产和电力生产过程和原料运输产生的间接环境影响。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The research scope includes raw material mining and processing, so it involves primary resources, energy consumption and pollution emissions of limestone, coal production, electricity production and raw material transportation. The data comes from the research results of Di Xianghua and Li Lu. In order to eliminate the difference in transportation distance, it is assumed that all limestone is transported by road using 20t diesel vehicles with a transportation distance of 10km, and raw coal is transported by rail with a 3000t diesel locomotive with a transportation distance of 100km.The cement production resource consumption data adopts the research results of Li Songbing. The energy consumption comes from the data published by the Cement Industry Association and refers to the "2010 Cement Industry Risk Analysis Report". The emission coefficients of powder (smoke) dust and SO2 and NOx pollutants in the exhaust gas adopt the 2008 Statistical results of China's pollution source census; CO2 emissions are estimated according to their sources.

研究范围包括原料开采、加工过程，所以涉及石灰石、煤炭生产、电力生产和原料运输的初级资源、能源消耗和污染排放，数据来自狄向华和李璐的研究成果。为消除运输距离的差异，假设石灰石全部采用20t柴油汽车公路运输，运距为10km，原煤采用3000t的内燃机车铁路运输，运距为100km。水泥生产资源消耗数据采用李松炳的研究成果，能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》，粉（烟）尘以及废气中的SO2、NOx污染物排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果；CO2排放按其来源进行估算。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 周志刚. (2011). 水泥工业物质代谢及生态化转型研究 [博士, 天津大学].
周志刚. (2011). 水泥工业物质代谢及生态化转型研究 [博士, 天津大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data Use Instructions for Ordinary Portland Cement LCA: When utilizing this LCA data, ensure it reflects the typical process for small-scale cement production (<2000t/d) utilizing the new dry process. Incorporate the provided primary resource, energy consumption, and emission data from relevant studies in your environmental impact assessments. Adjust the transportation assumptions to match specific logistics if the standard 10km for limestone and 100km for coal do not apply to your case. Account for direct impacts of manufacturing phases (raw meal preparation, clinker burning, cement grinding, packaging) and indirect impacts from raw material transportation and the production of limestone, coal, and electricity used in cement production.

普通硅酸盐水泥生命周期评估(LCA)数据使用指南：使用此LCA数据时，确保它反映了小规模水泥生产(<2000吨/日)使用新型干法的典型工艺。在环境影响评估中，结合有关研究所提供的初级资源、能源消耗和排放数据。如果标准的石灰石运输10km和煤炭100km不适用于您的案例，请根据具体物流调整运输假设。计算制造阶段（生料制备、熟料烧成、水泥粉磨、包装）的直接影响以及原材料运输和用于水泥生产的石灰石、煤炭和电力生产过程产生的间接影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Limestone. The resource consumption data is based on the research results of Li Songbing.
石灰石。资源消耗数据采用李松炳的研究成果。
Raw coal. The energy consumption data comes from the Cement Industry Association and refers to the "2010 Cement Industry Risk Analysis Report".
原煤。能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》。
Crude oil. The energy consumption data comes from the Cement Industry Association and refers to the "2010 Cement Industry Risk Analysis Report".
原油。能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》。
Diesel. The energy consumption data comes from the Cement Industry Association and refers to the "2010 Cement Industry Risk Analysis Report".
柴油。能源消耗来自水泥工业协会公布的数据并参考《2010年水泥行业风险分析报告》。

Dust and particulate matter, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The emission factor of particulate matter (PM) pollutant in flue gas is based on the statistical results of the 2008 China Pollution Source Census.
烟尘和粉尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。粉（烟）尘排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果。
SO2. The emission factor of SO2 pollutant in flue gas is based on the statistical results of the 2008 China Pollution Source Census.
SO2。废气中的SO2污染物排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果。
NOx. The emission factor of NOx pollutant in flue gas is based on the statistical results of the 2008 China Pollution Source Census.
NOx。废气中的NOx污染物排放系数采用2008年中国污染源普查统计结果。

CO2. CO2 emissions are estimated based on their sources. The specific estimation method is as follows:①CO2 produced from carbonate decomposition. During the cement production process, the decomposition of limestone to produce cement clinker requires CaO, which also generates CO2. The chemical reaction is as follows: CaCO3→CaO+CO2↑. The chemical equation for the decomposition of CaCO3 shows that for every 1 part of CaO produced, 0.7857 parts of CO2 are also generated. Based on the average content of CaO in the main mineral components of ordinary Portland cement in China, which ranges from 62% to 67%, assuming 65%, the CO2 produced from the decomposition of CaCO3 for every ton of cement clinker produced is: 1 ton × 0.7857 × 65% = 0.5071 ton. In addition, cement raw materials usually contain a small amount of magnesium carbonate, which also decomposes and produces CO2 during calcination. The chemical reaction is as follows: MgCO3→MgO+CO2↑. The chemical equation for the decomposition of MgCO3 shows that for every 1 part of MgO produced, 1.1 parts of CO2 are also generated. Based on the average content of MgO in the main mineral components of ordinary Portland cement in China, which ranges from 1% to 3%, assuming 1.5%, the CO2 produced from the decomposition of magnesium carbonate for every ton of cement clinker produced is: 1 ton × 1.1 × 1.5% = 0.0165 ton. In summary, the total amount of CO2 produced from carbonate decomposition during cement clinker production is: 0.5071 ton + 0.0165 ton = 0.5236 ton.②CO2 emitted from cement kiln fuel combustion. The formation of cement clinker requires high-temperature calcination, during which CO2 is generated from fuel combustion to provide high temperature. According to research results from the IPCC, the carbon emission factor of raw coal in China is 2.7715 kg CO2/kg of raw coal.

CO2。CO2排放按其来源进行估算。具体估算方法如下：①碳酸分解产生的CO2。水泥生产过程中石灰石的分解生成水泥熟料必须的Cao同时会生成CO2，其化学反应式为： CaCO3→Cao+CO2 ↑。CaCO3分解的化学反应式表明：每生成1份的Cao，同时会生成0.7857份的 CO2，根据国内的平均水平，我国普通硅酸盐水泥的主要矿物化学成分中CaO含量的大致波动范围为：62-67％，如果按65%计算，每生产1吨水泥熟料，由CaCO3分解产生CO2为：1t×0.7857×65％=0.5071t。 另外，水泥生料中通常含有少量的碳酸镁，碳酸镁在煅烧过程中分解也会产 生CO2，其化学反应式为：MgCO3→Mgo+CO2↑。MgCO3分解的化学反应式表明：每生成1份的 Mgo，同时会生成1.1份的CO2，根据国内的平均水平，我国普通硅酸盐水泥的主要矿物化学成分中MgO含量的大致波动范围为：1-3％，如果按1.5%计算，每生产1t水泥熟料，由碳酸镁分解产生的CO2为：1t×1.1×1.5％＝0.0165t。 综合计算，在水泥熟料生产过程中，由碳酸盐分解产生的CO2总量为：0.5107t + 0.0165t=0.5272t。②水泥窑燃料燃烧排放的CO2。水泥熟料的形成需要高温煅烧，煅烧过程中燃料燃烧提供高温的过程中会生成CO2，根据IPCC的研究成果，我国原煤的碳排放系数为2.7715kgCO2/kg原煤。
